doc.title: Divided We Fall: The Voices of America
doc.plot: On September 11th 2001 terrorists attacked the United States of America killing over 3000 Americans. On September 12th Jais Sardo and his wife Tess quit their jobs, packed up their car and set out on a journey. While visiting all fifty states the couple used their home video camera to document the thoughts and feelings of the American people. Finding individuals from every walk of life, Jais and Tess capture the fear, patriotism and anger that filled America post 9/11.
